Author: MBB Bridge Team
Name: Mgicite Babel v1.4.10.4 Thai Version by iarcanar
Description: Advanced real-time translation system with customizable character database (personality, gender, status, terminology). Delivers Netflix-quality translation through FFXIV's rich storytelling. Features elegant UI with auto-show/hide, full customization (size, colors), and seamless gameplay integration. Commands: /mbb (main UI), /mbb launch (start translator).
Punchline: Real-time FFXIV translation with advanced character database and Netflix-quality localization
